item.title: CVE-2024-1843|2024-03-13T15:26:33.130Z -- thedark -- Auto Affiliate Links
item.description: The Auto Affiliate Links plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the aalAddLink function in all versions up to, and including, 6.4.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to add arbitrary links to posts.
